case of virtual currency robbery on
Ho Chi Minh City Long Thanh Expressway, the jury upheld the

one defendant had his
sentence reduced, with defendants Ho Ngoc Tai and Tran
Ngoc Hoang presiding over the case.  Robber Mu Vu received a
life sentence. Defendant Nguyen Anh Tuan had his
sentence reduced from 12 years in prison to 10 years and 6
months in prison. The remaining 13 defendants each
received a sentence of 9 to 18 years in prison according to the content of the
case on January 17.  5, 2020 at the

Before that, these two sisters performed

Mai Thi remembers showing signs of

her 11th child, Mai Trong, 30 years old,
